info.name: Roblox, but everything is in Comic Sans
info.description:
No regrets.
Can severely impact brain health, so use with care.
Also works on the devforum and robloxlabs websites.
If you find any text that is not in Comic Sans, be sure to say so!


bancomicsans.com
info.additionalInfo:
v1.0
- Changed everything into Comic Sans.

v1.2
- Changed even more things into Comic Sans.

v1.3
- Changed EVEN MORE things into Comic Sans.

v1.4
- Changed the devforum logo to Comic Sans.

v1.5
- The wiki is now partially in Comic Sans.

v1.6
- Huh. Actually works now. Everything is in Comic Sans.

Warning: Only works if you have Comic Sans installed on your machine.
